collection_holder_name: Iowa Women's Archives at the University of Iowa Libraries
pageContext.collection_description: Includes letters written in support of Driftmier's candidacy for the Iowa Mother of the Year Award, newspaper clippings about her career, family sketches taken from a scrapbook and a published memoir by Driftmier's daughter, Lucile Verness. A radio broadcaster, Driftmier was the founder of Kitchen-Klatter on KFNF, Shenandoah, IA.
